July 11, 1953 D Selby Contest
Selby Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
selby-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Moments with Wagner
Selby, North Yorkshire, England, UK March contest 1st Rothwell (80), 2nd Slaithwaite (79), 3rd Hammonds (78), equal 4th (77) Birdwell and Skelmanthorpe. Deportment 1st Slaithwaite, 2nd Yeadon, 3rd Hammonds. Prizes - 1st £24, 2nd £14, 3rd £6. Contest promoted by Selby and District Agricultural Show.
13 bands competed.
Feb. 26, 2013, 4:02 p.m. March 26, 2019, 10:08 a.m.
1 Hammonds Junior Band Gershom Collison
2 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Gordon Roberts
3 Skelmanthorpe Band Willie Kaye
4 Birdwell Brass Winston Moore
5 Boarshurst Silver Band Russell Buckley
6 Prince-Smith and Stells Silver Band Alex Mortimer
